allow:
Bash(# Check each widget for ChartSkeleton usage vs custom skeleton
widgets=(
""StockDistributionChartV2.tsx""
""WarehouseWorkLevelAreaChart.tsx""
""TopProductsByQuantityWidget.tsx""
""TopProductsDistributionWidget.tsx""
""StaffWorkloadWidget.tsx""
""TransferTimeDistributionWidget.tsx""
""StockLevelHistoryChart.tsx""
""InventoryOrderedAnalysisWidget.tsx""
""AcoOrderProgressWidget.tsx""
""AnalysisExpandableCards.tsx""
""AnalysisPagedWidgetV2.tsx""
""ProductDistributionChartWidget.tsx""
""InjectionProductionStatsWidget.tsx""
""HistoryTreeV2.tsx""
""GrnReportWidgetV2.tsx""
""SupplierUpdateWidgetV2.tsx""
""StockTypeSelector.tsx""
)

echo ""Widget Migration Status Check:""
echo ""==============================""
for widget in ""${widgets[@]}""; do
    file=""app/admin/components/dashboard/widgets/$widget""
    if [ -f ""$file"" ]; then
        echo -n ""$widget: ""
        if grep -q ""ChartSkeleton"" ""$file"" 2>/dev/null; then
            echo ""✅ Migrated to ChartSkeleton""
        elif grep -q ""loadingContent\|LoadingState\|animate-pulse\|Skeleton"" ""$file"" 2>/dev/null; then
            echo ""❌ Still using custom skeleton""
        else
            echo ""⚠️  No skeleton found""
        fi
    else
        echo ""$widget: ❓ File not found""
    fi
done)

Bash(# Check each widget for ChartSkeleton usage vs custom skeleton
echo ""Widget Migration Status Check:""
echo ""==============================""

# Check each widget individually
echo -n ""1. StockDistributionChartV2.tsx: ""
grep -q ""ChartSkeleton"" ""app/admin/components/dashboard/widgets/StockDistributionChartV2.tsx"" 2>/dev/null && echo ""✅ Migrated to ChartSkeleton"" || echo ""❌ Still using custom skeleton""
